Articles.Content:
I figured that since i "converted" a recent career for 1.0 from .90, that valentina would have to be hired, but i went into the debug menu and she doesn't show up at all, not even in uknowned. Any fix to this?

Edited April 28, 2015 by Poofer
I'm guessing you'd have to start a new career.

I figured that since i "converted" a recent career for 1.0 from .90, that valentina would have to be hired, but i went into the debug menu and she doesn't show up at all, not even in uknowned. Any fix to this?

Sadly, I don't think there is any easy way without doing a bunch of configing. I recommend starting a new career save .

Figured as much.

oh well, I'll keep mucking around with this career until all my mods update to 1.0
Import a craft with her in it?

You do not need to start a new game. You can edit the persistence file and add her to the list of crew.


                }
		KERBAL
		{
			name = Valentina Kerman
			gender = Female
			type = Crew
			brave = 0.55
			dumb = 0.4
			badS = True
			tour = False
			state = Available
			ToD = 0
			idx = -1
			CAREER_LOG
			{
				flight = 0
			}
			FLIGHT_LOG
			{
				flight = 0
			}

Fit this into the roster near the end of the file, make sure to match the format (and backup the file first!). It's a lot easier than it may seem, no worries.

ah yes, i've edited saves before to fix invalid ships....(removing a part from 10-12 ships )

thanks for the heads up
